title: Give black cleaver the Wit's end treatment
body:
25% max armor shred

5% armor shred per stack as a melee
2.5% armor shred per stack as a ranged

replies.body:
Just a question

Why is this item needed in the game when many of its users already have pen built into their kits or massive aoe damage?
And it would become cheaper to pick up on the early game.  What could possibly go wrong?!

> Give black cleaver the Wit's end treatment 

That doesn't make any sense.  How does doing that to Black Cleaver allow Riot to avoid nerfing Guinsoo's?
where did you see me talking about avoiding nerfing guinsoo?

Right here.
> Give black cleaver the **Wit's end treatment **

That's why they are doing it.    Which is not surprising, we all know by now that if X is a problem, Riot will nerf A, B, C that X uses before they finally nerf it.  So the reason and goal doesn't make sense here.
